LoanApplicationTitleHolder.name: LoanApplicationTitleHolder
LoanApplicationTitleHolder.description: Represents details of borrowers who are applying to hold title to the property the loan application finances.

IsCurrentTitleHolder.description: Indicates whether person is a current title holder on property to be refinanced.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LoanApplicationId.description: Loan application associated with this title holder.

Name.description: Name of the loan application title holder.

TitleHolderExtIdentifier.description: ID that uniquely identifies imported data in an external data source (if applicable). This field is unique within your organization.

TitleHolderName.description: Name of the person on the title for the property associated with the loan application.
